Key Match Events: Mexico lost 2-0 in the first match against Honduras
Goals by Anthony Lozano and Bryan Róchez for Honduras
Guillermo Ochoa had to be substituted due to injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second match will be played at the Estadio Azteca
Mexico needs to win to advance
Others: The first match was played in Tegucigalpa, Honduras
Luis García was one of the scorers for Mexico in the first match
